item.title: #10 - Gold Stars
item.description: The Question: What are you worth? The Topic: Gold stars are apparently a bit like masturbation. The Viewermail: Dealing with a nasty divorce. thewritersdailypodcast@gmail.com

item.title: #10 - Gold Stars
item.description: the_question What are you worth? Would you consider your worth in dollar amounts, what is your price? Maybe you think your life is priceless, or for example would you throw it away to protect those you love? How about in a slave scenario? Personally I can say that I’m literally worth nothing, as proved by the lack of tips on my online adult webcam account. the_topic Gold Stars
